comment: Completely unfair teacher. This was supposed to be a seminar class where you learn about the college and its history. However this was turned into a class where you do a bunch of random busy work and type a bunch of papers. In addition that, making an a was almost impossible unlike every other seminar class. Choose someone else
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS--Tests are tough

comment: Professor Robinson isnt the worst teacher in the world. She just gives a lot of work, and she has zero toleration for you not turning in the work. It is a lot more than other classes, but it's not the end of the world if you have to take her class. If you just do your work and study for the tests, you'll pass. Just be prepared for a lot of reading
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: a freshmen seminar class is ment to be a class for adjusting to college. Kekes class is like taking your highest level English class. you write a total of 12 papers (2-3) pages in the semester. take 3 tests and 3 quizzes and then a lot of hw assignments. do not take keke any other professor is just fine but this one apparently forgot its a seminar.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tests are tough
